alert.note: Alert for Shawnee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 7:07PM CDT until April 23 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Shawnee County in east central Kansas... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 707 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pauline, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Topeka, Tecumseh and Pauline. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 353 and 355. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 172 and 186. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
